resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/82056</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>82056</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4718</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Aerial Photography</string>
            <string language="es">Fotografía aérea</string>
            <string language="ga">Aer-ghrianghrafadóireacht</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Luftfotographie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Photographie Aérienne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fotografia Aérea</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fotographia Aerea</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αεροφωτογραφία</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Student worksheet outlining how to locate items on an aerial photo. The exercise guides students in such a task.</string>
            <string language="es">Hoja de trabajo para el estudiante que describe cómo localizar elementos en una foto aérea. El ejercicio guía a los estudiantes en dicha tarea.</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog oibre do dhaltaí a imlíníonn an chaoi le rudaí a aimsiú ar aer-ghrianghraf. Treoraíonn an cheacht seo daltaí i dtasc dá leithéid.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Geography</string>
            <string language="es">Geografía. Hoja de trabajo</string>
            <string language="ga">Tíreolaíocht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Worksheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Oibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmerbogen, der wie man Einzelteile auf 
einem Luftfoto umreißt, lokalisiert. Die Übung führen 
Kursteilnehmer in solch eine Aufgabe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau d'étudiant traçant les grandes lignes 
de comment localiser des éléments sur une photo aérienne. 
L'exercice guident des étudiants dans un tel charger.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha do estudante que esboça como encontrar 
artigos em uma foto aérea. O exercício guia estudantes em tal 
tarefa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro dell'allievo che descrive come 
individuare gli articoli su una foto aerea. L'esercitazione 
guida gli allievi in una tal operazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας σπουδαστών που περιγράφει πώς να 
εντοπίσει τα αντικείμενα σε μια εναέρια φωτογραφία. Η 
άσκηση καθοδηγεί τους σπουδαστές σε μια τέτοια στοιχειώδη 
εργασία.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geographie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Géographie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Geografia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Geografia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γεωγραφία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

          <description>
            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
